---
title: "Contributions"
---

We welcome contributions to help improve NIMBLE.

These may include:

- New algorithms to the [nimble](https://github.com/nimble-dev/nimble) repository (or the appropriate nimble auxiliary package, such as `nimbleHMC`, `nimbleEcology`, etc.
- Usage examples to the [demos](https://github.com/nimble-dev/nimble-demos) repository.
- Improvements to our manual in the `UserManual` directory of the [nimble](https://github.com/nimble-dev/nimble) repository.
- Tutorial or workshop materials to the [outreach](https://github.com/nimble-dev/nimble-outreach) repository.

### How to Contribute

Contributions to NIMBLE can be made by [forking](https://help.github.com/articles/fork-a-repo/) the NIMBLE repository and submitting a [pull request](https://help.github.com/articles/using-pull-requests/) with your changes.

If you have questions about this workflow, or would like to request membership to the NIMBLE GitHub organization, please contact the [development team](mailto:nimble.stats@gmail.com).
